meaning_str.bing:
adj. 热切的；渴望的；渴求的
网络. 热心的；急切的；热心于

热切的；渴望的；热心的；急切的；渴求的；热望的；热衷的；渴盼的

1.en: Anita Mui is not eager to make more money, but just wants to [Share the moment, Share life] with all her fans at Shanghai Tai Mou Tai!
1.cn: 梅艳芳不想多赚钱，只想能在上海大舞台与喜欢她的歌迷一起“分享此刻分享生活”了！

2.en: Buck did not comprehend that silent intentness , nor the eager way with which they were licking their chops.
2.cn: 巴克对那种沉默的专注大为不解，也不明白他们为什么贪婪地舔嘴巴。

3.en: I was so eager to say it out I am not the kind ever to express my feelings because I thought being strong means never losing self control.
3.cn: 我如此渴望讲它以致于我不表示我感情的那种人我认为从未使自我控制失去的坚固方法。

0.en: I know ladies don't seek to seem too eager...
0.cn: 我了解小姐们都会矜持推诿一下……

1.en: I know you are eager to answer their calls, but your training is not yet complete.
1.cn: 我知道你们急於给予敌人猛烈的回击，但是你们的训练还没有全部完成。

2.en: Thank you for purchasing the movie 3000. I am eager and ready to shoot your first movie.
2.cn: 谢谢你购买电影3000！我迫不及待想你拍第一部影片了。

3.en: Thank you for purchasing the movie 3000! I am eager and ready to shoot your first movie.
3.cn: 谢谢你购买电影3000！我迫不及待想你拍第一部影片了。

4.en: I hadn't really loved him. It was just a fling. I was more eager than ever to rejoin Space Corp.
4.cn: 我从未真正爱过他，只是一时放纵，我加入太空公司的愿望更加强烈了。

5.en: It's lame, I know. But I'm a goal-oriented person, very eager to learn. Okay, hold on just a second.
5.cn: 那些经验很烂，我知道，但我是目标导向的那种人，渴望学习。请等一下。

6.en: Good morning. If I could have everyone's attention, please? I know we're all eager to get on the road to Big Sur.
6.cn: 早上好，大家请注意？我知道我们都想尽快开往大苏。

7.en: I had to call my 9-year-old grandson just to find out what a USB connector was. But I'll get there. Eager to learn.
7.cn: 我还不得不打电话问了我九岁的孙子，就为了问USB接口是什么东西。但我会学会的，我渴望去学习。

8.en: One of the things that happens to every university professor is that at the beginning of each semester, the students come incredibly eager.
8.cn: 每个学期开学的时候，大学教授们都会看到同样的情况，学生们的求学之心尤为热切。

9.en: A lot of lonely young men down here. Supposed to keep their hands off the merchandise. Creates something of an opening that I'm sure you were eager to fill.
9.cn: 这下面有好多孤寂的小伙子啊，他们本来是不可以碰商品的，创造某种开口，我相信你一定迫不及待地"插满"。

10.en: I see. Who is supposed to have shot him, then? Some over-eager squaddie with an itchy trigger finger, that's who. That's not what happened at all. It is now.
10.cn: 我明白了，这样一来，是谁开的枪？某个迫不及待的士兵手痒扣动了扳机而已。这根本就不是真相。现在是了。

11.en: You take an eager interest in that gentleman's concerns. He told me of his misfortunes. Oh, yes, his misfortunes have been very great indeed. You ruin his chances and yet you treat him with sarcasm.
11.cn: 你对他的确十分关心。他告诉了我他的不幸遭遇。哦，他的确太不幸啦。你毁了他，现在更讥讽他。
